column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/79d06dc6e07103b31b530f71b7187ea82c34266b for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK on code changes + tested that -printblock still works as expected\n
strncmp is a C function, which requires C strings.\n
Seems like you could use boost::starts_with here instead. Personally I think that'd be cleaner than using a C function on two C++ strings.\n
